00043 #include "compiler.h"
00044 #include "preprocessor.h"
00045 #include "gpio.h"
00046 #include "sdramc.h"
00047 
00048 
00053 static void sdramc_ck_delay(unsigned long ck)
00054 {
00055   // Use the CPU cycle counter (CPU and HSB clocks are the same).
00056   unsigned long delay_start_cycle = Get_system_register(AVR32_COUNT);
00057   unsigned long delay_end_cycle = delay_start_cycle + ck;
00058 
00059   // To be safer, the end of wait is based on an inequality test, so CPU cycle
00060   // counter wrap around is checked.
00061   if (delay_start_cycle <= delay_end_cycle)
00062   {
00063     while ((unsigned long)Get_system_register(AVR32_COUNT) < delay_end_cycle);
00064   }
00065   else
00066   {
00067     while ((unsigned long)Get_system_register(AVR32_COUNT) > delay_end_cycle);
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00077 #define sdramc_ns_delay(ns, hsb_mhz_up)   sdramc_ck_delay(((ns) * (hsb_mhz_up) + 999) / 1000)
00078 
00079 
00085 #define sdramc_us_delay(us, hsb_mhz_up)   sdramc_ck_delay((us) * (hsb_mhz_up))
00086

00091 static void sdramc_enable_muxed_pins(void)
00092 {
00093   static const gpio_map_t SDRAMC_EBI_GPIO_MAP =
00094   {
00095     // Enable data pins.
00096 #define SDRAMC_ENABLE_DATA_PIN(DATA_BIT, unused) \
00097     {AVR32_EBI_DATA_##DATA_BIT##_PIN, AVR32_EBI_DATA_##DATA_BIT##_FUNCTION},
00098     MREPEAT(SDRAM_DBW, SDRAMC_ENABLE_DATA_PIN, ~)
00099 #undef SDRAMC_ENABLE_DATA_PIN
00100 
00101     // Enable row/column address pins.
00102     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_2_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_2_FUNCTION           },
00103     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_3_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_3_FUNCTION           },
00104     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_4_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_4_FUNCTION           },
00105     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_5_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_5_FUNCTION           },
00106     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_6_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_6_FUNCTION           },
00107     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_7_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_7_FUNCTION           },
00108     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_8_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_8_FUNCTION           },
00109     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_9_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_9_FUNCTION           },
00110     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_10_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_10_FUNCTION          },
00111     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_11_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_11_FUNCTION          },
00112     {AVR32_EBI_SDA10_0_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_SDA10_0_FUNCTION          },
00113 #if SDRAM_ROW_BITS >= 12
00114     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_13_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_13_FUNCTION          },
00115   #if SDRAM_ROW_BITS >= 13
00116     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_14_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_14_FUNCTION          },
00117   #endif
00118 #endif
00119 
00120     // Enable bank address pins.
00121     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_16_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_16_FUNCTION          },
00122 #if SDRAM_BANK_BITS >= 2
00123     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_17_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_ADDR_17_FUNCTION          },
00124 #endif
00125 
00126     // Enable data mask pins.
00127     {AVR32_EBI_ADDR_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_ADDR_0_FUNCTION           },
00128     {AVR32_EBI_NWE1_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_NWE1_0_FUNCTION           },
00129 #if SDRAM_DBW >= 32
00130     {AVR32_EBI_NWE2_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_NWE2_0_FUNCTION           },
00131     {AVR32_EBI_NWE3_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_NWE3_0_FUNCTION           },
00132 #endif
00133 
00134     // Enable control pins.
00135     {AVR32_EBI_SDWE_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_SDWE_0_FUNCTION           },
00136     {AVR32_EBI_CAS_0_PIN,             AVR32_EBI_CAS_0_FUNCTION            },
00137     {AVR32_EBI_RAS_0_PIN,             AVR32_EBI_RAS_0_FUNCTION            },
00138     {AVR32_EBI_NCS_1_PIN,             AVR32_EBI_NCS_1_FUNCTION            },
00139 
00140     // Enable clock-related pins.
00141     {AVR32_EBI_SDCK_0_PIN,            AVR32_EBI_SDCK_0_FUNCTION           },
00142     {AVR32_EBI_SDCKE_0_PIN,           AVR32_EBI_SDCKE_0_FUNCTION          }
00143   };
00144 
00145   gpio_enable_module(SDRAMC_EBI_GPIO_MAP, sizeof(SDRAMC_EBI_GPIO_MAP) / sizeof(SDRAMC_EBI_GPIO_MAP[0]));
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 void sdramc_init(unsigned long hsb_hz)
00150 {
00151   unsigned long hsb_mhz_dn = hsb_hz / 1000000;
00152   unsigned long hsb_mhz_up = (hsb_hz + 999999) / 1000000;
00153   volatile ATPASTE2(U, SDRAM_DBW) *sdram = SDRAM;
00154   unsigned int i;
00155 
00156   // Put the multiplexed MCU pins used for the SDRAM under control of the SDRAMC.
00157   sdramc_enable_muxed_pins();
00158 
00159   // Enable SDRAM mode for CS1.
00160   AVR32_HMATRIX.sfr[AVR32_EBI_HMATRIX_NR] |= 1 << AVR32_EBI_SDRAM_CS;
00161   AVR32_HMATRIX.sfr[AVR32_EBI_HMATRIX_NR];
00162 
00163   // Configure the SDRAM Controller with SDRAM setup and timing information.
00164   // All timings below are rounded up because they are minimal values.
00165   AVR32_SDRAMC.cr =
00166       ((( SDRAM_COL_BITS                 -    8) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NC_OFFSET  ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NC_MASK  ) |
00167       ((( SDRAM_ROW_BITS                 -   11) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NR_OFFSET  ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NR_MASK  ) |
00168       ((( SDRAM_BANK_BITS                -    1) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NB_OFFSET  ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_NB_MASK  ) |
00169       ((  SDRAM_CAS                              << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_CAS_OFFSET ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_CAS_MASK ) |
00170       ((( SDRAM_DBW                      >>   4) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_DBW_OFFSET ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_DBW_MASK ) |
00171       ((((SDRAM_TWR  * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TWR_OFFSET ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TWR_MASK ) |
00172       ((((SDRAM_TRC  * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRC_OFFSET ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRC_MASK ) |
00173       ((((SDRAM_TRP  * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRP_OFFSET ) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRP_MASK ) |
00174       ((((SDRAM_TRCD * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRCD_OFFSET) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRCD_MASK) |
00175       ((((SDRAM_TRAS * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRAS_OFFSET) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TRAS_MASK) |
00176       ((((SDRAM_TXSR * hsb_mhz_up + 999) / 1000) << AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TXSR_OFFSET) & AVR32_SDRAMC_CR_TXSR_MASK);
00177   AVR32_SDRAMC.cr;
00178 
00179   // Issue a NOP command to the SDRAM in order to start the generation of SDRAMC signals.
00180   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_NOP;
00181   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00182   sdram[0];
00183 
00184   // Wait during the SDRAM stable-clock initialization delay.
00185   sdramc_us_delay(SDRAM_STABLE_CLOCK_INIT_DELAY, hsb_mhz_up);
00186 
00187   // Issue a PRECHARGE ALL command to the SDRAM.
00188   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_BANKS_PRECHARGE;
00189   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00190   sdram[0];
00191   sdramc_ns_delay(SDRAM_TRP, hsb_mhz_up);
00192 
00193   // Issue initialization AUTO REFRESH commands to the SDRAM.
00194   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_AUTO_REFRESH;
00195   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00196   for (i = 0; i < SDRAM_INIT_AUTO_REFRESH_COUNT; i++)
00197   {
00198     sdram[0];
00199     sdramc_ns_delay(SDRAM_TRFC, hsb_mhz_up);
00200   }
00201 
00202   // Issue a LOAD MODE REGISTER command to the SDRAM.
00203   // This configures the SDRAM with the following parameters in the mode register:
00204   //  - bits 0 to 2: burst length: 1 (000b);
00205   //  - bit 3: burst type: sequential (0b);
00206   //  - bits 4 to 6: CAS latency: AVR32_SDRAMC.CR.cas;
00207   //  - bits 7 to 8: operating mode: standard operation (00b);
00208   //  - bit 9: write burst mode: programmed burst length (0b);
00209   //  - all other bits: reserved: 0b.
00210   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_LOAD_MODE;
00211   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00212   sdram[0];
00213   sdramc_ns_delay(SDRAM_TMRD, hsb_mhz_up);
00214 
00215   // Switch the SDRAM Controller to normal mode.
00216   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr = AVR32_SDRAMC_MR_MODE_NORMAL;
00217   AVR32_SDRAMC.mr;
00218   sdram[0];
00219 
00220   // Write the refresh period into the SDRAMC Refresh Timer Register.
00221   // tR is rounded down because it is a maximal value.
00222   AVR32_SDRAMC.tr = (SDRAM_TR * hsb_mhz_dn) / 1000;
00223   AVR32_SDRAMC.tr;
00224 }
Generated on Thu Sep 20 12:16:45 2007 for AVR32 - MT48LC16M16A2TG-7E SDRAM Driver by  1.5.1-p1
